name: JUSTICE FOR GREENWOOD FOUNDATION
description: Aims to revitalize the Greenwood Community and Diaspora
sampleDescriptions: Seeking redress for the Tulsa Greenwood community, living survivors and descendants of those impacted by the Tulsa Race Massacre and Seeking full citizenship for the Black Creek Indians in the Muscoge
